eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a vehicle is removed.

functionDecorators.name: authorizeValidatorSigner
functionDecorators.description: Authorizes new validator signer that can manage group registration/deregistration and group memebrs. {v, r, s} constitutes proof-of-key-possession signature of signer for this contract address.

functionDecorators.name: authorizeVoteSigner
functionDecorators.description: Authorizes new vote signer that can manage voting for all of groups locked CELO. {v, r, s} constitutes proof-of-key-possession signature of signer for this contract address.

functionDecorators.name: exchangeAndDonateEpochRewards
functionDecorators.description: Exchanges cUSD epoch rewards to CELO and donates it back to SavingsCELO contract. Anyone can call this function. Since cUSD rewards per epoch are significantly smaller compared to Exchange buckets, it is safe to allow anyone to call this function and convert cUSD -> CELO at market rate at any point.

functionDecorators.name: lockGold
functionDecorators.description: Proxy function for locked CELO management.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: relockGold
functionDecorators.description: Proxy function for locked CELO management.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unlockGold
functionDecorators.description: Proxy function for locked CELO management.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Transfer CELO back to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawLockedGold
functionDecorators.description: Proxy function for locked CELO management.
